alert.note: Alert for Comerio; Dorado; Naranjito; Toa Alta; Toa Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 20 at 12:13AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues along Rio de la Plata, with the latest reported river stage at 19.48 feet at 11:00 PM. This surpass flood stage at 16 feet. Streamflows along this river will fall slowly within the next hours. * WHERE...Comerio, Dorado, Naranjito, Toa Alta and Toa Baja. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM AST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1107 PM AST, Automated river gauges indicated excessive runoffs from previous rains maintaining higher streamflows along Rio de la Plata. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naranjito, Toa Alta, Comerio, Toa Baja, Dorado, Pajaros, Galateo, Rio Lajas, Candelaria, San Jose, Candelaria Arenas, Campanilla, Ingenio, Palomas and Mucarabones. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Comerio; Dorado; Naranjito; Toa Alta; Toa Baja
